GAMEPLAY_SkiGogglesDescription.English: Finally something to protect the eyes from bright light and the cold.
GAMEPLAY_SkiGogglesDescription.German: Endlich etwas, um die Augen vor grellem Licht und Kälte zu schützen.
GAMEPLAY_SkiGogglesDescription.Russian: Защищает глаза от яркого света и холода.
GAMEPLAY_SkiGogglesDescription.Turkish: Sonunda gözleri parlak ışıktan ve soğuktan korumak için bir şey.

GAMEPLAY_SkiMaskDescription.English: Very warm ski mask, covering most of the face.
GAMEPLAY_SkiMaskDescription.German: Sehr warme Skimaske, die den Großteil des Gesichts bedeckt.
GAMEPLAY_SkiMaskDescription.Russian: Очень теплая лыжная маска, покрывающая большую часть лица.
GAMEPLAY_SkiMaskDescription.Turkish: Yüzün çoğunu kaplayan çok sıcak kayak maskesi.

GAMEPLAY_BeanieCapDescription.English: A warm hat for being out in the cold.

GAMEPLAY_FaceMaskDescription.English: Sometime before the apocalypse, people used to wear these everywhere.

GAMEPLAY_FarmBootsDescription.English: Not very warm, but tough and made for working.
